schemes.name: PM-KISAN
schemes.policy_text: Direct income support of Rs. 6000 per year to all landholding farmers' families having cultivable land, paid in three equal installments of Rs. 2000 each.

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.policy_text: Guaranteed 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to every household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.

schemes.name: Van Dhan Vikas Yojana
schemes.policy_text: An initiative for value addition, branding & marketing of tribal products including Minor Forest Produce (MFP) through establishment of Van Dhan Kendras.

schemes.name: PMAY-G (Tribal Component)
schemes.policy_text: Provide pucca house with basic amenities to all rural families living in kutcha and dilapidated houses by 2024, with special focus on tribal areas.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
schemes.policy_text: Provide LPG connections to women from BPL households, with special provisions for tribal communities to reduce their dependence on fossil fuels.

schemes.name: Tribal Sub Plan
schemes.policy_text: A comprehensive plan for socio-economic development of tribal communities including education, health, livelihood and infrastructure development in scheduled areas.

schemes.name: PMFBY (Tribal Areas)
schemes.policy_text: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers suffering crop loss/damage arising out of unforeseen events, with subsidized premium for tribal farmers.

schemes.name: Skill Development for Tribal Youth
schemes.policy_text: Skill training programs specifically designed for tribal youth focusing on traditional crafts, modern technology and entrepreneurship development.
